open.prompt:
If the user asks you to open an app, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: open <app_name>

close.prompt:
If the user asks you to close an app, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: close <app_name>

time.prompt:
If the user asks for what time it is, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: time

day.prompt:
If the user asks you the date, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: day

terminate.prompt:
If the user asks you to stop yourself, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: terminate

press.prompt:
If the user asks you to click somewhere, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: press <somewhere>

restart.prompt:
If the user asks you to restart an app, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: close <app_name> ACTION: open <app_name>

focus.prompt:
If the user asks you to focus on an app, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: focus <app_name>

browse.prompt:
If the user asks you to browse for something, ONLY answer with : 
ACTION: browse <subject>
